com.xilinx.rapidwright.router

Class AbstractRouter

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.router.AbstractRouter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Router

    public abstract class AbstractRouter
extends Object
    A common class to serve as the place for common router-related methods.

        Gets are returns a list of reserved nodes for the provide net.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A list of reserved nodes for the net, or null if no nodes are reserved.

      • markNodeUsed

      • addInitialSourceForRouting

        public void addInitialSourceForRouting(SitePinInst currSource)
        This will add the sole source of the net to the set of sources to be used by the router. It also updates the Router's currSources with the sole source of the net.
        Parameters:
        sources - The set of sources for this net to be used for routing
        currSource - The source pin of the net

      • setCost

        public void setCost(RouteNode routeNode,
                    boolean isRouteThrough)
        Cost function, used to set each node's cost to be prioritized by the queue
        Parameters:
        routeNode - The node to calculate and set its cost based on currSink.
